  // Change: Reduce the scale factor, add a small recency bonus, and smooth frequency
  double calculate_priority(uint64_t freq, uint64_t size) {
    constexpr double recency_bonus = 1.0e-4;
    if (size == 0) {
      return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq + 1) * 3.0e5 + recency_bonus * request_counter;
    }
    // Use freq+1 (avoids early starvation), smaller scale, slight recency bonus
    return pri_last_evict + ((double)(freq + 1) * 3.0e5 / size) + recency_bonus * request_counter;
  }

  void insert(obj_id_t obj_id, uint64_t obj_size) {
    if (cache_objects.count(obj_id)) {
      find(obj_id);
      return;
    }

    CacheObject new_obj;
    new_obj.size = obj_size;
    new_obj.frequency = 1;

    double pri = calculate_priority(new_obj.frequency, new_obj.size);
    PQNode new_node(pri, ++request_counter, obj_id);
    auto [set_iter, inserted] = priority_queue.insert(new_node);

    new_obj.pq_iterator = set_iter;
    cache_objects[obj_id] = new_obj;
  }

  void insert(obj_id_t obj_id, uint64_t obj_size) {
    if (cache_objects.count(obj_id)) {
      find(obj_id);
      return;
    }

    CacheObject new_obj;
    new_obj.size = obj_size;

    // Slightly boost frequency for large objects to prevent premature eviction
    if (obj_size > 1024*128) {
      new_obj.frequency = 2;
    } else {
      new_obj.frequency = 1;
    }

    double pri = calculate_priority(new_obj.frequency, new_obj.size);
    PQNode new_node(pri, ++request_counter, obj_id);
    auto [set_iter, inserted] = priority_queue.insert(new_node);

    new_obj.pq_iterator = set_iter;
    cache_objects[obj_id] = new_obj;
  }
